title: Send rate card and availability
description: Brand requested collaboration details. Send rate card, confirm deliverables, and share availability for next month.

title: Review Instagram verification and account status
description: Platform email about verification status. Log in securely, confirm it’s legitimate, and verify there are no account issues.

title: Confirm interest and schedule interview
description: Respond to BrightPR to confirm interest, request interview details, and propose 2–3 available slots.
